root.name: Facemaker
root.description: Facemaker is an educational game for the Texas Instruments 99/4A where the player designs a face by using an assortment of eyes, ears, noses, and mouths. The player can animate the face using several preset motions (smiling, frowning, wiggling the ears). The game also has a memory sub-game that has the player matching the actions of a CPU controlled face.Â A screenshot from Facemaker for the TI-99/4A
